titles.title: Family Fairness in Taxing Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to accelerate the increase in the child tax credit and to expand the refundability of such credit, and for other purposes.
Family Fairness in Taxing Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Family Fairness in Taxing Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the child care credit to: (1) revise refundability criteria; (2) accelerate the increase to a $1,000 credit; and (3) increase a qualifying child's age to 19 years old.
